x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Right now, for banking sector, KYC process request has to be uploaded manually and signed by the customer by going to bank physically or any agent is working on it. We want to utilize this process automatically.
Organizations across banking, insurance, and fintech face growing challenges in managing Know Your Customer (KYC) verification processes. These processes are often manual, time-consuming, and error-prone, involving repetitive data validation, document reviews, and compliance checks.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Idea:


Use ServiceNow’s Document Intelligence or integrate with GenAI models (like Azure/OpenAI Vision or Google DocAI) to automatically:

Read uploaded KYC docs (PAN, Aadhaar, passport, etc.)

Extract key entities — name, DOB, address, ID number

Validate against form data automatically

When a human reviewer opens a KYC record, GenAI provides a summary panel like:

“KYC documents verified. Name and address match CRM record. Aadhaar valid until 2028. No red flags detected.”

 

ServiceNow products or capabilities:

Create a Flow Designer or Action that triggers on KYC submission
Use Document Intelligence API or custom GenAI model for extraction
Configure an Agent Action Orchestrator Flow
Extend the Now Assist Panel on the KYC form view
Use a prompt template to summarize and recommend approval

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

We should have Virtual Agent, Document Intelligence, Agentic AI, NowAssist
